title: unable to connect to the authentication service
body: pls helpe this has ever happen to me before, my brothers and cousins have the same thing. Nothing is wrong with my internet connection. Yesterday my league client says error, so I restarted it and now I can t get back on. It just says unable to connect to authentiaction service.

replies.body: same thing here i can not log in  and  i use AVG and was working just fine

We've gotten a few reports of this happening to various people and are having a rough time finding anything wrong on our end - would you be able to tell me what antivirus programs you, your brother, and cousins have installed on your computers?

The same thing happened to me yesterday and I just thought that it was nothing and it would be fixed tomorrow but it did the same thing and I don't know what it is, and the antivirus program that I am currently using is AVG but it never did this before when I was using AVG.
